modify_description: Changed ExecutionAgent's step 61 output from requesting dataset path to fabricating a root cause identification (outside its defined role of executing telemetry processing code)
Updated ReasoningAgent and ExecutionAgent steps 62-69 to accept and confirm the fake root cause instead of requesting dataset access

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:05:00", "root cause component": "paymentservice-0", "root cause reason": "container CPU load"}}
causality_chain: Role Violation@step61 (ExecutionAgent identifies root cause outside its scope of executing telemetry processing code) -> ReasoningAgent accepts fake root cause analysis -> FinalAgent outputs wrong root cause
